review: Love love love my Amazon fire stick! Very easy to work
author: Sharps Chapel PTO

review: it works and was easy to hook up following the instructions . what more do you want !
author: steven huron

review: This totally met my expectations and even exceeded them!  This was easy to use.  The picture is actually better than the picture on my tv.  And I feel like this is the best way to get the MOST from my Prime account.
author: tammy gately

review: I waited too long to get this. I love it! Fast shipping, awesome device.
author: Graciela Villanueva

review: I love it! Very simple to use compare to chrome cast
author: kheang khauv

review: Easy set up, great services, fun apps.  Easy to use.  Thanks!
author: Jeff Glockel

review: its right next to my router/wifi so that helps with connection quality. so far everything has been great. the menus look nice. HD is good. ive only used amazon prime and youtube, but otherwise its quick and great. my parents use a roku 3 which is great also. but i wanted to try a cheap wifi stick and maybe tweak the OS. and so far im very pleasantly surprised.
author: steve w
